channel.title: Let's Get Fiscal
channel.description: Australian Employment Party MMT Podcast with party co-founders Iain Dooley & Tim Jones
channel.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones

item.title: Taxes Don't Pay for Things
item.description: Tim & Iain discuss how government spending creates money, and taxation destroys it
item.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones

item.title: Deficits Are Good
item.description: Tim & Iain discuss the fact that deficit spending by the government provides the opportunity for the private sector to save.
item.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones

item.title: There is No Government Debt
item.description: Tim & Iain discuss the fact that the word "debt" is very misleading when applied to a currency issuing government.
item.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones

item.title: What is Full Employment?
item.description: Tim & Iain discuss the fact that a currency issuing government with a floating exchange rate is free to pursue full employment.
item.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones

item.title: What is the Australian Employment Party?
item.description: Tim & Iain discuss the non-economic policies of the Australian Employment Party.
item.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones

item.title: UBI vs JG, #Parakeelia, #Medicare
item.description: Tim & Iain discuss news topics relevant to the 2016 election as well as comparing a universal basic income to a job guarantee
item.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones

item.title: Bernadi, #Brexit, Bunkum Credit Ratings
item.description: Tim & Iain discuss the controversial decision by Britain to leave the EU, whingeing Bernadi and corrupt, irrelevant ratings agencies.
item.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones

item.title: Diversity & the Road to Party Registration
item.description: Tim & Iain discuss the present and future goals of the party and how you can help spread the word and get the party registered.
item.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones

item.title: The AEP mission and #RatingsRubbish
item.description: Tim & Iain discuss the mission of the party and how to deal with AAA credit rating nonsense fed to us by our "leaders".
item.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones

item.title: Wherein Tim Takes Iain to Task Over the Job Guarantee
item.description: Tim & Iain discuss the specifics of what a Job Guarantee would look like in Australia.
item.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones

item.title: Islamophobia & Fiscal Discipline
item.description: Tim & Iain discuss the outbreak of anti-muslim sentiment in Australia, and the artificial constraints we place on our spending via the AOFM.
item.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones

item.title: How does journalism work?
item.description: Iain discusses the mechanics of journalism with special guest Una Butorac from SBS.
item.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones

item.title: Morals, Ethics & #IndigenousDads
item.description: Iain & Tim discuss the social policy framework of the AEP and how it pertains to minor party mayhem and racist free speech, as well as the proposed method of policy development for the AEP.
item.itunes:author: Iain Dooley & Tim Jones
